overview: Can you fit into the tight schedules of Barely Legal #31's busy young debutantes? These horny tramps have been waiting 18 years for a lawful fuck, and now there's no holding them back! Two chicks on one dick is a groovy time saver when there's a bothersome boy shortage. Boffing outdoors is a healthy alternative when the folks are home and none of your friends have a house you can use. Whatever the circumstances, our girls are always ready - so pencil in some quality time with Barely Legal #31, or get the kiss-off from these hustling hotties.
tagline: We Do It All The Time
title: Barely Legal 31
